contributionDescription: I am a loyal user of Optimism with over 500 transactions treev my wallet address, and I am also actively participating in Quests on OP Mainnet with 14 completed quests but until now I have not received the airdrop Which from Optimism. I hope this RetroPGF Round 3 will have my name on it. Thank you!

contributionLinks.description: Here is my wallet address, hope you consider confirming the airdrop for me

impactDescription: As the ecosystem expands, new user growth is true, but will loyal users like me get many?. And I hope in the future I will receive a little reward from you through my small contributions. and in the future I hope Optimism will expand and develop further
pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violating the "Promises of future impact" rule as the applicant is promising further participation and impact.
pwCategorySuggestions: Decentralized Finance (DeFi), User Experience & Adoption, Community Building
